021import net.tnemc.core.TNECore;
022import net.tnemc.core.command.BaseCommand;
023import net.tnemc.plugincore.bukkit.impl.BukkitCMDSource;
024import revxrsal.commands.annotation.Command;
025import revxrsal.commands.annotation.Default;
026import revxrsal.commands.annotation.Description;
027import revxrsal.commands.annotation.Subcommand;
028import revxrsal.commands.annotation.Usage;
029import revxrsal.commands.bukkit.actor.BukkitCommandActor;
030import revxrsal.commands.bukkit.annotation.CommandPermission;
031import revxrsal.commands.help.Help;
032
033/**
034 * ModuleCommand
035 *
036 * @author creatorfromhell
037 * @since 0.1.2.0
038 */
039@Command({ "module", "mod" })
040public class ModuleCommand {
041
042  @Subcommand({ "help", "?" })
043  @Usage("Help.Arguments")
044  @Description("Help.Description")
045  public void help(final BukkitCommandActor actor, final Help.RelatedCommands<?> commands, @Default("1") final int page) {
046
047    BaseCommand.help(new BukkitCMDSource(actor), commands, page);
048  }
049
050  @Subcommand({ "avail", "available" })
051  @Usage("Module.Available.Arguments")
052  @Description("Module.Available.Description")
053  @CommandPermission("tne.module.available")
054  public void onAvailable(final BukkitCommandActor sender, @Default(TNECore.coreURL) final String url) {
055
056    net.tnemc.core.command.ModuleCommand.onAvailable(new BukkitCMDSource(sender), url);
057  }
058
059  @Subcommand({ "download", "dl" })
060  @Usage("Module.Download.Arguments")
061  @Description("Module.Download.Description")
062  @CommandPermission("tne.module.download")
063  public void onDownload(final BukkitCommandActor sender, final String moduleName, @Default(TNECore.coreURL) final String url) {
064
065    net.tnemc.core.command.ModuleCommand.onDownload(new BukkitCMDSource(sender), moduleName, url);
066  }
067
068  @Subcommand({ "info", "i" })
069  @Usage("Module.Info.Arguments")
070  @Description("Module.Info.Description")
071  @CommandPermission("tne.module.info")
072  public void onInfo(final BukkitCommandActor sender, final String moduleName) {
073
074    net.tnemc.core.command.ModuleCommand.onInfo(new BukkitCMDSource(sender), moduleName);
075  }
076
077  @Subcommand({ "list", "l" })
078  @Usage("Module.List.Arguments")
079  //@DefaultFor({ "module", "mod" })
080  @Description("Module.List.Description")
081  @CommandPermission("tne.list.available")
082  public void onList(final BukkitCommandActor sender) {
083
084    net.tnemc.core.command.ModuleCommand.onList(new BukkitCMDSource(sender));
085  }
086
087  @Subcommand({ "load" })
088  @Usage("Module.Load.Arguments")
089  @Description("Module.Load.Description")
090  @CommandPermission("tne.module.load")
091  public void onLoad(final BukkitCommandActor sender, final String moduleName) {
092
093    net.tnemc.core.command.ModuleCommand.onLoad(new BukkitCMDSource(sender), moduleName);
094  }
095}
